headline.main: VINDICTIVE BAIL. In reducing the bail of

docs.lead_paragraph: FREDERICK HOFFMAN, the alleged defaulter, Judge LEONARD has established a claim to public approval. Justice CONNOLLY, it will be remembered, after listening to the affidavits of the officers of the Pacific Steamship Company, thought proper to fix the security necessary to the prisoner's temporary release at the handsome sum of $22,000.

byline.original: Special Dispatch to the New-York Times

docs.snippet: FRENCH INTERVENTION IN MEXICO.  M. DUBOYS DE SALIGNY, the Special Minister of France to Mexico, is expected to arrive here about Sept. 1, to consult with the Washington Cabinet,  prior to intervening in the affairs of that country.

headline.main: GENERAL TELEGRAPHIC NEWS.; FROM WASHINGTON. FRENCH INTERVENTION IN MEXICO. Co-operation of the American Government Refused. Expenses of Entertaining the Japanese in Washington Another Contest for the Printing Spoils, &c. News from Pike's Peak.
